venue.name: Microsoft New England Research & Development Center (NERD)

item.description:
Our March JavaScript Meetup will be held Thursday, March 11th at Microsoft Research Center located at One Memorial Drive in Cambridge. When you arrive security will direct you to the correct floor. There is also parking available at a cheap evening rate in the building. Parking is also free on the street in front of the building at 6 PM.

At 6:30 PM our fellow member Jim Wilson will talk about hexlib, a JavaScript UI library he's been developing for making tile-based web games, particularly for use with Google Wave and other Comet frameworks. You can learn more on this project at http://github.com/jim...

After the presentation | demonstration, we will go around the room introducing ourselves and asking the group for advice | opinions on any JavaScript-related issues members are facing.

Microsoft will provide pizza again. What a generous organization!

Please RSVP and bring guests.
item.name: Hexlib: A JavaScript library for creating web games by Jim Wilson
